item.description:
Fathom Events is doing a series in January featuring the best of Rifftrax Live! This includes two of the worst movies ever made, Manos: The Hands of Fate and Plan 9 From Outer Space. Since we've already seen Manos as a group, let's go and see Plan 9.

Tickets are available at

http://www.fathomevents.com/#!rifftrax-plan-9-from-outer-space/more-info/details

BE SURE TO BUY A TICKET IN ADVANCE - Fathom events like this seem to sell out regularly.

The show starts at 7:30, so let's meet in the lobby of the theater at around 6:45 or 7 so we can find each other and sit together.
item.name: Rifftrax Live: Plan 9 From Outer Space
